Reviews.Author: joli0308
Reviews.Content: Is to slow can't download apps it takes a long time to start cannot hear videos speakers are to soft
Reviews.Title: blu touchbook 7.0

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This review is solely based on the product. You definitely get what you pay for. It has android 4.0 but it lags. The touchscreen is not as responsive. The USB port does not function, defeating the purpose for which I purchased the tablet.  My prepaid phone works better than this tablet.  Save up your money and get a Samsung tab because you will be disappointed with this item.
Reviews.Title: Not worth the money

ProductInfo.Features: Cellular Band - Android Tablet - Wi-Fi Only
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Touch Book 7.0 Lite P50 Tablet PC with Android 4.0 OS, Multi-Touchscreen, MP3/MP4 Player, Wi-Fi and microSD Slot - White
